text: Hey there :slightly_smiling_face: is there a function to check the divergences in a NUTS chain? I thought there was a function in MCMCChains but i can’t find it  anymore

elements.text: is there a function to check the divergences in a NUTS chain? I thought there was a function in MCMCChains but i can’t find it  anymore

text:
There was an earlier thread that solved this but we lost because it is earlier than the free-tier of slack.

But here it is

```# Divergences
sum(chn[:numerical_error])

# Acceptance Rate
mean(chn[:acceptance_rate])```
